name: University of Southern California
description: Located in Los Angeles, a global center for arts, technology and international trade, the University of Southern California is one of the worldâ€™s leading private research universities. USC enrolls more international students than any other U.S. university and offers extensive opportunities for internships and study abroad. With a strong tradition of integrating liberal and professional education, USC fosters a vibrant culture of public service and encourages students to cross academic as well as geographic boundaries in their pursuit of knowledge.
